bio: I am a recent graduate of Arizona State’s software engineering program, originally from the third coast state -- Michigan. Currently I am living in Bristol, Rhode Island.

I enjoy bringing technology and design together to create solutions for complex ideas and problems. For me, putting the user’s experience first and creating smart and intuitive UI is an important aspect of development and design. I use tools and frameworks such as Vue, React, & SASS to create UI/UX to convey complex information in easy to understand ways.
When not knee deep in code, I enjoy boardgames, winning (hopefully) trivia nights, or delving into my own creations.
